name: SodaWorld - MiniJam
description:
This is a simple prototype stealth game for Mini Jam 55

The characters and part of the environment are taken from craftpix.net and from our previous projects. Music is your own.

Control:

Move - Left | A & Right | D

Jump - Space

Fire - LCtr

Stealth - Down | S

Story:
A meteorite enters the space explorer Gmyz’s ship. And breaks the fuel tank. He finds an approaching planet and makes an emergency landing. The inhabitants of the planet are engaged in the production of soda. Gmyz decides to assemble a new type of soda engine.

But what to do, residents do not sell it and give it for free. Option one is to steal.
It is good that our hero has an invisibility suit for difficult situations. The charge is consumed quickly and you have to wait for recovery. So the researcher will try himself in the new role of a thief.

Whether he manages to find the missing soda and leave an unfriendly planet is up to you.

Good luck.
